name: Cognitive Fortification Techniques
description: Developing advanced cognitive resilience to prevent PSNs from infiltrating thought processes.

cards.title: Building an Impenetrable Cognitive Firewall
cards.description: Blocking manipulative influence before it enters the subconscious.
bulletpoints: Identifying linguistic cues that indicate manipulation attempts.
Using critical thinking patterns to prevent narrative implantation.
Practicing meta-cognition to recognize external influence.
cards.summaryText: Catalog the language that hints at manipulation, run every claim through your critical-thinking filters, and stay meta-aware so outside voices never slip past your guard.

cards.title: Reinforcing Logical Independence
cards.description: Training the mind to prioritize logic over emotional coercion.
bulletpoints: Identifying emotional hijacking and separating logic from impulse.
Strengthening reality-testing skills to detect falsified perceptions.
Developing mental algorithms for filtering information integrity.
cards.summaryText: Spot the exact moment emotion tries to steer you, cross-check reality before believing it, and run all inputs through a personal logic algorithm that flags bad data.

cards.title: Mental Discipline and Cognitive Autonomy
cards.description: Eliminating vulnerabilities that allow PSNs to control thought patterns.
bulletpoints: Creating mental compartmentalization techniques to prevent forced thought shifts.
Practicing controlled exposure to manipulation tactics to build immunity.
Developing higher-order reasoning to dismantle deceptive framing.
